website_summaries.verdict: Designed to fit into small spaces, the innovative wide design offers more interior room than expected from a compact unit.
pros: The wide design of this 1.4 cubic foot unit means users give up less interior space than other compact models
Can handle a medium-sized casserole dish
Ideal for cooking small plates or reheating.The microwave will last with moderate use – some have lasted as many as 5 years
cons: 800 watts handles smaller dishes this model was designed for, but may require extra time to cook larger dishes

customer_reviews.title: I waited about a month after receiving it to write this review to give some good time to really test it
customer_reviews.text: We had the GE Spacesaver before this purchase. It lasted us almost 21 years. We have high expectations for the next microwave to be so robust and yet not dominate space in the kitchen. This GE Profile has succeeded. I waited about a month after receiving it to write this review to give some good time to really test it. It's a workhorse and we are very pleased. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Victoria R.

customer_reviews.title: Not the same microwave as before
customer_reviews.text: Not at all what I expected. I was under the impression that this microwave was the newer, more improved version of my older Spacemaker. NOT. It is very tinny and vents at the bottom so if you are prepping food near the microwave while it is in use— you are treated to a blast of heat for as long as it is running. Very disappointed. The use and care booklet is 3 pages long— ridiculous. GE you should be ashamed of this.
customer_reviews.author: Claudia G Montani

customer_reviews.title: Unhappy Customer
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed big time, especially for $249 plus $41 for the under cabinet bracket. This large unit comes with a glass turntable, like cheap low end units do, which makes it useless for using with large bake dishes that would otherwise fit in it. My previous Spacemaker used a beam splitter instead of rotating the food. I'm returning this unit. It is useless to me. If I can only get a micro with a rotating turntable, I'll get one for $50 and save my money. Decidely an unhappy customer here.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan Sundance

customer_reviews.title: Great low-medium power microwave (800 Watt output) which does the job of heating up small dishes in my small kitchenette.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great low-medium power microwave (800 Watt output) which I needed just to heat up leftovers and small dishes, which does the job well. I live in a small apartment and I can't have a high-current drawing appliance in my kitchenette because it will trip the 15 Amp circuit breaker. (This microwave draws about 11 AMPS electrical current). My 20 year old GE Microwave still works and I hope this one will last as long!
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't match the dimensions of the older model.
customer_reviews.text: We bought this microwave to replace the older version. The microwave had to fit into the cabinet opening. Also stated dimensions of PEM31DFWW model matched the older model, the new one very slightly wider and taller. I had to file maybe 1/8 of the inch to make it fit into the opening. It also means that the old cabinet frame can't be used on the new model. More to my disappointment, GE doesn't sell the frame for this model. As a microwave, it functions fine so far.
customer_reviews.author: Viksicom

customer_reviews.title: GE Microwave "Not as Advertised"
customer_reviews.text: The microwave is fine, but... the online description said it included an "Under-Counter Mounting Kit," and a "Charcoal Filter." Neither of which is true/correct. The oven arrived, no mounting kit (which I need to install it) and there is no charcoal filter. We're heading out today to try and find the mounting kit locally, but there will surely be a cost associated with it, and per the text it was to be included. Someone needs to edit the online text so others aren't misled.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne Oehmke

customer_reviews.title: This arrived in perfect condition and on time
customer_reviews.text: This arrived in perfect condition and on time, however, the buttons are hard to push, there is no easy way to "reheat" an item (instructions are too complicated) and the inside turntable and related plate are smaller than the previous incarnation of this item so you can't use it for larger dishes/pans. If we had known about all of these "enhancements" we probably would have gotten a different microwave. But, so far it's up to snuff. Just wish it hadn't been "upgraded". My motto, "If it ain't broke, don't fix it."
customer_reviews.author: Ct. Yankee

customer_reviews.title: Literally the day I listed my house, it's predecessor died on me
customer_reviews.text: So I replaced it with this. Still manufactured the same way as the first, so could re-use the mounting brackets but it was like 80% quieter than the one I bought 7 years ago (same model). And they improved the read out so it wasn't blue (which is so hard on the eyes). AND, bought a 2nd one for the home I just moved into. So it's a keeper!
customer_reviews.author: Larkus

customer_reviews.title: Never say never...
customer_reviews.text: The seller was terrific the product arrived on time as promised. I said that I would never buy GE again after having had issues with a Cafe Microwave, the most expensive microwave in it’s class. This microwave was again the most expensive in it’s class, the only reason I bought this, is it was the only model in this size, That would fit a premade cabinet.
customer_reviews.author: Megadrive

customer_reviews.title: It's the only microwave that I could find to fit ...
customer_reviews.text: It's the only microwave that I could find to fit my space. It is essentially the same GE as the one I replaced but it seems a bit cheaper in construction. The buttons are not very sensitive. I have to push hard on them. With all of the complaining aside, it works well and I'm content.
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Done!!!
customer_reviews.text: Larger exterior than the one it replaces and a smaller interior and glass tray. Heats better and not as noisy as the old one which was 10 tears old. Template needs to be included and that only makes sense. We did not need all the other ones nor the screws and etc. that goes with the kit as we had the old. Plus it was hard to figure out which one to use till we measured often. could be so much simpler. 4stars due to poor directions and no template and extra money for kit.
customer_reviews.author: Nupe

customer_reviews.title: Change isn't necessarily better..
customer_reviews.text: This replaced the same model from 2008; didn't realize the interior dimensions are different. It's not quite as deep, but a little bit higher. Hope the microwave popcorn bag will still have room to rotate. The touchpad takes considerably more pressure to operate than the old one, and the printing on it is smaller. Yes, we're getting older, so both of those issues keep it from getting the 5th star. Aside from that, it's exactly what we wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Keith

customer_reviews.title: Fits the Bill
customer_reviews.text: This is a replacement for an older GE Spacemaker that I purchased 9 years ago. We mounted it under the kitchen cabinet. Just an FYI for others who are now doing the same, the bracket system is a bit different now so you cannot use the old one.
customer_reviews.author: smartgardener

customer_reviews.title: Under cabinet mounting may be a problem
customer_reviews.text: This unit replaces an older Profile microwave. Its appearance and functions are about the same. However be forewarned: the 4 top mounting holes for under-cabinet attachment are staggered in such a way that it is almost impossible to fit the unit underneath a standard wall-cabinet bottom if the wall socket is directly behind the unit. This is because one of the microwave's front holes (for attachment) is placed so far forward that the hole does not clear the front cabinet frame even when the microwave/plug is pushed flat against the wall socket.
customer_reviews.author: West Coast Jazz

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: I searched and searched for a microwave oven that would fit in the space where our old one was. This was the one! We ordered a trim kit and installed the microwave and kit in no time at all. So easy! And the microwave works perfectly. It's a small microwave, but it's a perfect replacement for our old one. It looks great in our kitchen!
customer_reviews.author: cj hart

customer_reviews.title: Great, versatile Microwave
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one of these that we own. The first was bought several years ago, went through a remodel (moved it to a temporary location) and eventually to a summer cabin where it still performs. This one is also at our summer location in another building and based on the ease and use of the first one, we bought another. Does an excellent job on baked potatoes, even better than our high end built in one in the kitchen. It is not deep so it fits well on a shelf or can be mounted under a standard 12" upper cabinet.
customer_reviews.author: Robert E. Bosso

customer_reviews.title: False dimensions
customer_reviews.text: Why would you present the dimensions as: 13 x 24 x 12 inches to mean depth by width by height when it is normal to present depth last? Who presents dimensions as depth x width by height? So now I have a microwave oven that is way to deep for my space. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: John Kaiser

customer_reviews.title: Mounting problems
customer_reviews.text: the online description said it included an "Under-Counter Mounting Kit," and a "Charcoal Filter." Neither of which is true/correct. mounting screw holes are now metric, old screws are standard asa. mounting holes now in different locations on right side. power cord sticks out more in back in back of unit. unit works fine.
customer_reviews.author: Vet

customer_reviews.title: Excellent in the wall Microwave.  Many Features.
customer_reviews.text: The only minor issue is door doesn't open unless you push the latch button quite hard. Other wise excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Donald Lepore

customer_reviews.title: Searched long and hard for a microwave to put over ...
customer_reviews.text: Searched long and hard for a microwave to put over my 24" stove. Did the trick VB perfectly. (Technically not to code). Just wait for it to arrive then buy the screws from home Depot rather than wastin $30 on a mounting kit.
customer_reviews.author: Joel K

customer_reviews.title: Does not pop popcorn in microwaveable package.
customer_reviews.text: The microwave is similar to all the other microwaves, however, this one does not pop popcorn. It's actually kind of weird. I have tried different brands and tried numerous times and had not luck. Kind of annoying. Had I known that in May when I purchased it, I would have returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Starr

customer_reviews.title: Works fine, but pricey
customer_reviews.text: Works fine, but pricey. Worried about the low wattage, but doesn't seem to any longer than our older, higher wattage microwave did when cooking.
customer_reviews.author: B. Cumming

customer_reviews.title: Small and underpowered
customer_reviews.text: It's clearly my fault for not reading the specs more closely but I was very disappointed in the size and the power of this rather expensive microwave. For what it is it works fine but I am still getting used to everything taking longer than it did in my old microwave.
customer_reviews.author: Debora J.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and works well. Also looks great in the kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: New York Reader

customer_reviews.title: Try a profile model.
customer_reviews.text: It's very quiet but the door opens and closes very loudly & feels sort of flimsy. It's also difficult to see inside when it's running so potential to over do things.
customer_reviews.author: Tamlen2

customer_reviews.title: Good size and mounts under by cabinete
customer_reviews.text: but the door sticks and doesn't open well. It needs two hands sometimes.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra M

customer_reviews.title: We like the 30 second feature also
customer_reviews.text: It is very quiet, compared to our old GE. Does everything we need and being 800 watts, doesn't use as much electricity. We like the 30 second feature also. Didn't have that on our old model. Wish we could have had it in the beige/almond color, but really liked the dimensions on this model and could not find any other microwaves this size. It is perfect for over my sink and very convenient while I am doing dishes I can see what is going on in the oven. We are highly satisfied!!! CE
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Missing pieces
customer_reviews.text: Product was not only difficult to use but it also did not come with the plastic turntable support wheel! GE should be ashamed to be making a product of this price without all of its essential components.
customer_reviews.author: Bill MacAllister

customer_reviews.title: The product is great for us
customer_reviews.text: The product is great for us. We had one installed under cabinet when our kitchen was remodeled. This is the only unit that fits. The downside is that they last about 4 years with daily use and each time we replace it the mounting holes don't match up requiring new holes drilled and mounting bracket alterations. It is a REAL PIA.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen Panec

customer_reviews.title: meets expectations
customer_reviews.text: fit perfectly in my spot. SUPER quiet, almost sounds like it's not working! would have got 5 stars but the timer function stinks. I used this all the time on my previous version but on this one it just beeps once, not very loud so it's useless for countdown timing.
customer_reviews.author: S. Boyd

customer_reviews.title: However once we got the space modified and was able to use the microwave we love it. It's simple to use
customer_reviews.text: We had the previous model and needed to replace it. This new one didn't fit in the old space because it is 1/2 inch wider from left to right. However once we got the space modified and was able to use the microwave we love it. It's simple to use. Heats foods well. We'd recommend it
customer_reviews.author: JanS

customer_reviews.title: We replaced an old model with a new model, ...
customer_reviews.text: We replaced an old model with a new model, and installed it with a microwave ventillation kit. It is important that you make sure to have proper ventillation around the microwave. We bought a new home and inherited the old model which was installed with built-in cabinets tightly framed around the microwave (no ventillation kit used). So, when we bought our new home, the microwave did not work - completely due to the fact that the remodeler did not consider ventillation.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: review
customer_reviews.text: It is quiet in running. Door hinge requires additional space of cabinet to fully swing open.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit to replace previous model of 20 years. No problem with installation. New unit has a turntable.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce

customer_reviews.title: False specification
customer_reviews.text: Ordered twice. Neither item had hanging kit as stated in specification.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen D

customer_reviews.title: This is the only microwave oven that fits in built ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the only microwave oven that fits in built in cabinet space. If we weren't replacing an older version of this oven that failed we would not have purchased this one. It is too expensive for what you get. Light weight materials. Cheap latch.
customer_reviews.author: Ralph T. Perkins

customer_reviews.title: So far so good ....
customer_reviews.text: Have limited options for microwaves because of an over-the-counter built-in opening. This one fits the opening. Have only had it operational for about 4-5 days, and am pleased so far.
customer_reviews.author: EMR

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for me
customer_reviews.text: The only microwave that would fit where my old microwave was. Looks good and works fine.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Christian

customer_reviews.title: Best microwave
customer_reviews.text: Love this microwave. Fits perfectly and arrived in perfect shape
customer_reviews.author: Philip J. Poggi

customer_reviews.title: I can see quality control is bad. Door would not open properly
customer_reviews.text: Have already returned item. I can see quality control is bad. Door would not open properly. Out of alignment. When you did shut door it would not start,until you moved door. This item is not of any quality.
customer_reviews.author: David Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Works fine.
customer_reviews.text: Extremely pricey, but fits on a 12 inch shelf. Works fine.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Aron

customer_reviews.title: Saved $100 compared to new price of 12 year old unit we replaced. Quality appliance.
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Sturdy appliance, works well & looks great. Size matters with these low profile units, dimensions are precise.
customer_reviews.author: John Q. Public

customer_reviews.title: Great Appliance
customer_reviews.text: The only one who will fit in my kitchen space. And I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy O. Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great microwave, easy to work. Does a super job and looks nice.
customer_reviews.author: TinaC

customer_reviews.title: Great microwave.
customer_reviews.text: This GE microwave is wonderful. It works well and has every feature I could possible ask for.
customer_reviews.author: L. Osterweil

customer_reviews.title: This is a newer version of the GE microwave we ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a newer version of the GE microwave we purchased several years ago. Our last one burned out in about seven years of light to moderate use so hopefully this will last longer. Seems to work about as well as the older version however the door latch release is more difficult to push in to open the door.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Buwalda

customer_reviews.title: Unit is perfect but was ordered fpr under cabinet use and did ...
customer_reviews.text: Unit is perfect but was ordered fpr under cabinet use and did not come with a templet to set up proper holes.
customer_reviews.author: GEORGE R. KOCH

customer_reviews.title: Fortunately Amazon arranged a
customer_reviews.text: Not reliable. Worked for a week. Fortunately Amazon arranged a return
customer_reviews.author: Adele Harrell

customer_reviews.title: Perfectly mounted for open counterspace below
customer_reviews.text: This was for my office breakroom and fit perfectly mounted under my upper wall cabinets. Gives the necessary clearance to put and use the counterspace under it and matches our white cabinets . Works just fine and cooks good too. I'm happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: I don't remember how long the one this replaced lasted ...
customer_reviews.text: I don't remember how long the one this replaced lasted. It didn't quit, I retired it. If this one lasts half as long i'll be thrilled.
customer_reviews.author: Art B

customer_reviews.title: Excellent machine/installation nightmre
customer_reviews.text: This was a replacement for a very old version of the same thing. It's a very nice microwave, but don't look for any help from GE to install it under the counter. They were unable to provide a working template. And the installation kit that is designated for this model is no good - there was not a single template in the packet that actually matched where the holes were in the microwave! They tell you it's the correct "substitution", but it's not.
customer_reviews.author: The Cat Mom

customer_reviews.title: Beware of measurements
customer_reviews.text: these are NOT the dimensions: Overall Depth 12 7/8 in Overall Height 12 1/8 in Overall Width 24 The height is around 11 3/4. May not matter to us, but we were using a custom built cabinet space. Just passing it along!
customer_reviews.author: Beth Spencer

customer_reviews.title: it works really great!
customer_reviews.text: Almost exact replacement for old unit. Power cord comes out at different angle (had to modify it). Other than that, it works really great!
customer_reviews.author: Ye Howard

customer_reviews.title: Replaced an old GE under cabinet unit that was 1 ...
customer_reviews.text: Replaced an old GE under cabinet unit that was 1 cu. ft. with this one. It fit perfectly with the new mounting kit. Just what we wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Elliott Murray

customer_reviews.title: Replacement for Built-in
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a replacement for an earlier built-in model that ran well but was not kept clean. So far this one is working well. Did have a problem with installation: for no good reason, the mounting holes in the top of the unit were move. This gratuitous incompatibility significantly increased the difficulty [and cost] of installation. Unfortunately, their is no competition for units of this size [ie, just GE and just this one model].
customer_reviews.author: book whisperer

customer_reviews.title: NOT A FIT
customer_reviews.text: The GE Answer center provided this model as the replacement for a GE Profile Spacesaver last bought in 2008, which delaminated. The latter fit perfectly into a cabinet built beautifully when the original kitchen was remodeled in 1992. Well, it turned out to be an approximate fit once various protrusions and hardware are taken into account; and doesn't match the space. Nor does GE apparently have a model that fits. So I am stuck with it on a counter that could otherwise be used for other things. And one can tell the quality is just not what the previous model offered.
customer_reviews.author: mark kahan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: We love this microwave.It is so quiet and all the different cooking options are great.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just a great unit.
customer_reviews.text: This new model replaced the same model that was 15 old, and I must say, was still working. Just a great unit.
customer_reviews.author: Richard J. Ricci

customer_reviews.title: No way to turn off sounds. Brown "deflector" piece ...
customer_reviews.text: No way to turn off sounds. Brown "deflector" piece inside microwave that looks tacky and aweful in a bright white mcirowave. Difficult to install under cabinet. Push button to open door seems not to be a tight fitting piece. The light inside is not very bright as pervious model. If I saw another option that worked for side and under cabinet model, I go with that...
customer_reviews.author: Bold Sea

customer_reviews.title: Great disappointment in quality.
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed in the quality of this microwave. Bought thinking it would be as good as a previous GE microwave. NOT. Called GE about it and they don't care. They consider it a throw away item. Unbelievable.
customer_reviews.author: Liz now in Boise

customer_reviews.title: control panel hard to read
customer_reviews.text: Oven is very good except that the control panel options and numbers are VERY hard to read. The color is to light, and you can't tell what you're pushing.. Have made many mistakes trying. Other than that unit is very good, and I would recommend it, if they made the control panel easier to read.
customer_reviews.author: owen huddleston

customer_reviews.title: Slide-in  replacement for old GE microwave Model # JEM31WF SPACEMAKER II
customer_reviews.text: GE PEM31DFWW Profile 1.1 Cu. Ft. White... replaces old GE microwave Model # JEM31W (discontinued) This replacement microwave fit the existing cabinet slot exactly, but the supporting fixtures had changed over time. Still, it all came together nicely and looks really good installed above the oven.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Buck

customer_reviews.title: Fair microwave
customer_reviews.text: This is my third GE replacement and it's probably my least favorite. We bought the first one 27 years ago and they seem to last between 7-10 years. The second one suffered from peeling paint. This one does not seem to be as powerful as the others and it is hard to see inside. They don't make new ones interchangeable with the last so that you can use the same kit to install. This is just sitting on a shelf.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Szafman

customer_reviews.title: We were not happy having to drill new holes in our oak cupboards
customer_reviews.text: This microwave was to replace an existing identical microwave. We went to hang it from the cupboard the holes did not match up. The holes in the microwave were drilled at a slant. We were not happy having to drill new holes in our oak cupboards.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia M

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The turning glass plate made a very loud continuous rattling noise. Had to return.
customer_reviews.author: claas

customer_reviews.title: Replacement for similar model
customer_reviews.text: It replaced a similar model, no longer made, which lasted under 4 years. The interior dimensions of this one are a bit smaller. Check the diameter of the maximum-sized plate you would use on a regular basis to make sure it will fit on the turntable. As we did with the previous one, we mounted this under a wall cabinet.
customer_reviews.author: kml

customer_reviews.title: I am satisfied with the product
customer_reviews.text: microwave works well and arrived in quality packing although the box was waaayyyy too big! I am satisfied with the product. it replaced my previous GE low-profile microwave perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: carolyn

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great size for shorter height spaces, my second one bought
customer_reviews.author: bderf

customer_reviews.title: It fits and it is white
customer_reviews.text: I am surprised at how good it looks in white. And it fits under the cabinet perfectly. It was a little pricy, but it fits, looks good and works.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Gibbs

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great replacement for my 1992 microwave which died. It fit into existing space with a little of cabinet customization
customer_reviews.author: Lefty

customer_reviews.title: very versatile!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent microwave !! After using my old GE one for 16 years, I had no idea that there could be so many cooking variables on a microwave. Love the "Beverage" setting, and the "Re-heat" settings.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Kaiser

product_meta.title: GE PEM31DFWW Microwave Oven, 13 x 24 x 12 inches, White
product_meta.description: 1.1 cu. ft. Countertop Microwave Oven with 800 Watts, 10 Power Levels, Sensor Cooking Controls, Glass Turntable, Optional Hanging Kit and Control Lockout.
feature_bullets: Upfront charcoal filter with indicator light

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.8 out of 5 stars144 ratings3.8 out of 5 stars
